Lebowski.TextModel.DeleteEventArgs

Lebowski.TextModel.DeleteEventArgs Class Reference

Provides data for the Delete event. This is used for algorithms that are based on atomic operations (e.g. operational transformations). More...

DeleteOperation Operation [get, set]

Detailed Description

Provides data for the Delete event. This is used for algorithms that are based on atomic operations (e.g. operational transformations).
